name: Gone Mom
description:
A child getting lost in a supermarket makes for a daunting experience. Everything looks so big and so unfamiliar. It is hard finding the right path back to mom.

This game was done as a part of Global Game Jam 2021, in FGJ Helsinki Arabia Online.

CREDITS:
